test.name: I Login in Application

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |
kw.msg: Arguments: [ 'http://localhost:4723/wd/hub' | automationName='UIAutomator2' | platformName='Android' | deviceName='R58N323F7AN' | platformVersion='10' | appPackage='com.todoist' | appActivity='com.todoist.activity.HomeActivity' ]

Remote response: status=404 | data={"status":9,"value":{"error":"unknown command","message":"The requested resource could not be found, or a request was received using an HTTP method that is not supported by the mapped resource","stacktrace":""}} | headers=HTTPHeaderDict({'X-Powered-By': 'Express', 'Vary': 'X-HTTP-Method-Override', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Content-Length': '211', 'ETag': 'W/"d3-gyQ2eXfteJGx5Yg/CojOo7oJODc"', 'Date': 'Thu, 11 Jan 2024 17:31:52 GMT', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Keep-Alive': 'timeout=600'})

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.
kw.msg:

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.
